name: tracesAPI
description: Get transaction traces and block trace data from 1inch Traces API. Supports getting synced intervals, block traces by number, and transaction traces by hash or offset.

endpoint.description: The specific traces API endpoint to call

chain.description: Chain ID (1 for Ethereum, 137 for Polygon, etc.)

blockNumber.description: Block number (required for getBlockTraceByNumber, getTransactionTraceByHash, getTransactionTraceByOffset)

offset.description: Offset of transaction in block (required for getTransactionTraceByOffset)
